page.title: 16Cubs, Scouts and clubs.
page.content: {Cubs and Scouts} In 1985 the cubs have no meeting place in Brightwell, and the pack meets in North Moreton. We are busy fund raising to collect enough money to build a new hall for ourselves. During cub meetings we work for badges and play games. {Thursday Special} meets at the Free Church and is for younger children. It's great fun and we do a lot of different activities. {Crusaders} also meet at the Free Church, and is for the teenagers of the village. There are all sorts of clubs for all ages of residents of Brightwell. The {Tennis club} is very active and is enjoyed by young and old. {The Community Association} exists to promote clubs and events such as the annual Village Fete as well as activities for young and old.
